content.question: Which of the following is equivalent to <math alttext="d e t open parentheses, a 2 by 2 matrix with row 1 column 1 value 5, row 1 column 2 value negative 2, row 2 column 1 value 4, row 2 column 2 value 7, end matrix, close parentheses"><mtext>det</mtext><mfenced><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></mfenced></math> ?

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

topic.text: 4.11: The Inverse and Determinant of a Matrix
